topic.body: I never saw it before today, and it's spectacular!

How can I learn more about how ZeroMail work?

topic.title: When will sites be updated?
topic.body:
Hi!

Will sites be contiunsly updated, even if I close my browser window?

14_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf.body: Heard about it at TorrentFreak... This is really incredible, I'm amazed!

1_19yMrWm3whKF3s5vkcJT5vGJPFUAX3EPou.body: Try with putty/ssh tunnels :)   something like Local port: 43110, localhost:43110 something, should work

3_1EUyJtat7mbu5wMcR6nrJTPBBRons1mtMA.body:
For anyone else wondering, you can start at github: https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroMail
Something else that's interresting, where to learn about ZeroMail encryption?
